float3 Class Reference
[Mathematical support classes]

#include <float3.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

3-vector of scalar type float.

NOTE: The class behaves like C basic types what it comes to initialization so default constructor leaves the components to unspecified value. Alerting user is the reason also for that the name starts with lower-case letter.
